articles.title: Dan Ives says this tech stock is under the most pressure in AI era
articles.mainIdea: Dan Ives says this tech stock is under the most pressure in AI era
articles.summary: Yahoo Finance Video: Dan Ives says this tech stock is under the most pressure in AI era. Dan Ives, Wedbush's managing director and global head of technology research, says Adobe (ADBE) is "under the most pressure" to adapt amid the AI boom. Ives explains why and shares what most surprised him about the AI trade in 2025. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Morning Brief. Related tickers mentioned: CRM, ORCL.

articles.title: BMO Stays Outperform on Adobe (ADBE) Despite Competitive AI Pressures
articles.mainIdea: BMO Stays Outperform on Adobe (ADBE) Despite Competitive AI Pressures
articles.summary: Insider Monkey: BMO Stays Outperform on Adobe (ADBE) Despite Competitive AI Pressures. Adobe Inc. (NASDAQ:ADBE) is one of the AI Stocks in the Spotlight for Investors. On December 15, BMO Capital lowered its price target on the stock to $400 from $405 while maintaining an “Outperform” rating. The firm remains cautiously positive on the stock despite robust Q4 FY2025 results, citing competitive pressure in lower-end and AI […] Related tickers mentioned: BMO.

articles.title: Generative Renaissance Comes Alive: SIGGRAPH Asia 2025 Closes in Hong Kong
articles.mainIdea: Generative Renaissance Comes Alive: SIGGRAPH Asia 2025 Closes in Hong Kong
articles.summary: PR Newswire: Generative Renaissance Comes Alive: SIGGRAPH Asia 2025 Closes in Hong Kong. SIGGRAPH Asia 2025, themed "Generative Renaissance," has successfully come to a close at the Hong Kong Convention and Exhibition Centre. Over 6,000 attendees from 60 countries gathered to explore the latest innovations in computer graphics and interactive techniques. Related tickers mentioned: TCEHY.
